name: Hedgehog Technologies
address: Hedgehog Technologies, 2250 Boundary Rd #206, Burnaby, BC V5M 3Z3

featured_reviews.review_id: I was impressed by Hedgehog's personal commitment to their projects; they had boots on the ground making sure everything went smoothly, without micro-managing. They have a keen interest in what each subconsultant involved has to offer, to gain an even more thorough knowledge of the different pieces that make up the puzzle - this is only part of what makes their project management stand out. They have an inclusive project team mentality, making sure all aspects are covered and comments heard, while still being efficient.
featured_reviews.review_text: I was impressed by Hedgehog's personal commitment to their projects; they had boots on the ground making sure everything went smoothly, without micro-managing. They have a keen interest in what each subconsultant involved has to offer, to gain an even more thorough knowledge of the different pieces that make up the puzzle - this is only part of what makes their project management stand out. They have an inclusive project team mentality, making sure all aspects are covered and comments heard, while still being efficient.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, the pleasure is ours to work with you. We're always making sure we're there until the lights turn on!

featured_reviews.review_id:
I had an amazing time working at HHT. The quality of work delivered to customers and clients is beyond every standard in the industry. The management has a direct and open relationship with the employees which makes working at hedgehog a great experience.
Working along side top rated professional  engineers at hedgehog prepared me for taking on more difficult challenges which led to my current role at Tesla.

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for sharing such glowing sentiments. We appreciate and value your feedback!

featured_reviews.review_id: The staff at Hedgehog have been incredibly helpful, professional, and supportive throughout the design and building process. They were able to integrate many of the requested features for my project and were highly responsive to feedback and effectively set up times for collaboration and communication throughout.
featured_reviews.review_text: The staff at Hedgehog have been incredibly helpful, professional, and supportive throughout the design and building process. They were able to integrate many of the requested features for my project and were highly responsive to feedback and effectively set up times for collaboration and communication throughout.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for sharing your feedback - we greatly appreciate it!

featured_reviews.review_id: Hedgehog is ideal choice to lead any engineering project involving automation, power delivery, or functional safety.  The experienced team is prorfessional, courteous, and effective.  With their impressive background spanning manufacturing facilities, infrastructure, submarines, and even amusement rides, Hedgehog delivers amazing results for all stakeholders.

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: We truly appreciate your glowing sentiments. Thank you!

featured_reviews.review_id:
I had the pleasure of using Hedgehog Technologies as an outside engineering resource on a large project. They were very professional, flexible, and easy to work with. The experience went so well that when I moved on to another company and needed outside engineering help again I immediately thought of Hedgehog and have worked with them again on multiple additional projects.

Thank you for your help Hedgehog. I look forward to working with you more as the need arises.
featured_reviews.review_text:

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for sharing and we truly value your relationship with us!

featured_reviews.review_id:
I had the opportunity to see Hedgehog Technologies from the inside as part of a six-week management project. I have seen the inner workings of a lot of consulting companies, and HHT is genuinely in a league of its own. It all comes down to excellence, inclusiveness, and fun.

First, excellence. This is a company that seeks out unique, challenging work that most other EE companies can't handle. This is a sharp, elite team that is brought in on complex projects where human lives are at risk and safety is paramount. This can be seen in their projects - roller coasters, deep-sea submarines, and more.

Second, inclusiveness. Diversity is good, but it's really inclusiveness that matters. I saw how deeply this runs in HHT's DNA. On my last day in the office and at the end of a successful project, I wanted to pick up a few bottles of champagne for the team. I mentioned this to the president, Mike, and he kindly mentioned, "don't forget to pick up some de-alcoholized bubbles, too." I had completely overlooked the fact that there were team members that do not drink. It was absolutely front-of-mind for Mike that everyone gets to be included.

And speaking of fun, there is a reason you see so many smiles on LinkedIn and Twitter posts. Be it games of Coup at lunch, team events, monthly food culture events, or Friday runs to the DL Chicken Shack, there is a welcoming nature to this team that puts a smile on your face plus they can solve the really challenging problems.
featured_reviews.review_text:
I had the opportunity to see Hedgehog Technologies from the inside as part of a six-week management project. I have seen the inner workings of a lot of consulting companies, and HHT is genuinely in a league of its own. It all comes down to excellence, inclusiveness, and fun.

First, excellence. This is a company that seeks out unique, challenging work that most other EE companies can't handle. This is a sharp, elite team that is brought in on complex projects where human lives are at risk and safety is paramount. This can be seen in their projects - roller coasters, deep-sea submarines, and more.

Second, inclusiveness. Diversity is good, but it's really inclusiveness that matters. I saw how deeply this runs in HHT's DNA. On my last day in the office and at the end of a successful project, I wanted to pick up a few bottles of champagne for the team. I mentioned this to the president, Mike, and he kindly mentioned, "don't forget to pick up some de-alcoholized bubbles, too." I had completely overlooked the fact that there were team members that do not drink. It was absolutely front-of-mind for Mike that everyone gets to be included.

And speaking of fun, there is a reason you see so many smiles on LinkedIn and Twitter posts. Be it games of Coup at lunch, team events, monthly food culture events, or Friday runs to the DL Chicken Shack, there is a welcoming nature to this team that puts a smile on your face plus they can solve the really challenging problems.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for sharing your thoughts and feedback with us. The team greatly appreciates your glowing sentiments!

featured_reviews.review_id: Highly unprofessional. Projects cost overshoots by even project management standards. A company that shouldn't be trusted with audits or any other engineering tasks.
featured_reviews.review_text: Highly unprofessional. Projects cost overshoots by even project management standards. A company that shouldn't be trusted with audits or any other engineering tasks.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Hi Mark,

A review such as this concerns us and we can't find any record of you in our system. Would you be able to provide more detailed feedback on the incident in question? Please reach out to info@hedgehogtech.com or call us at 604-210-0204 to provide further information on this matter.

Best regards,

- Cale
